text: (ataṟku mūsā) “niccayamāka atu pūmiyil uḻavaṭippataṟkum, payirukkut taṇṇīr iṟaippataṟkum payaṉpaṭuttappaṭāta, atil aṟavē vaṭuvillāta kuṟaiyaṟṟa oru māṭu'' eṉṟu avaṉ kūṟukiṟāṉ eṉṟār. (Ataṟku) avarkaḷ''ippoḻututāṉ nīr cariyāṉa vivaram koṇṭu vantīr'' eṉak kūṟiya piṉṉum avarkaḷ aṟukka maṉamiṉṟiyē atai aṟuttārkaḷ
